Html: In the soloution explorer references properties window, I changed the GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Extras.Win8 Alias property from "global" to "GalaExtra" because of a namespace conflict.  However, when I try to build, the auto generated file "XamlTypeInfo.g.cs" still refers to the assembly by the "global" alias ( global::GalaSoft.MvvmLight.ObservableObject instead of GalaExtra::GalaSoft.MvvmLight.ObservableObject)
